basics.name: Rodolfo Rafael Dzul Cetina
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience
basics.summary: +10 years of experience as a Web Developer. I live in Mérida, Yucatán. I have worked in different environments: from accelerating the development of SMEs to leading teams in multinational companies.

work.name: The Palace Company
work.summary: Lead a product team for the development and implementation of a Unified Reservation Platform, stack: Serverless framework, Micro frontends with Vue 3, Vue 2 and React. AWS services: SNS, SQS, DynamoDB, Lambda, EventBridge, RDS and S3. CI/CD with GitHub Actions and Terraform.

work.name: The Palace Company
work.summary: I technically lead a product development team, we maintain and migrate a monolithic architecture to a more flexible and optimized one. I promote good practices and improvements in performance culture, in addition to the rapid delivery of value to users.

work.name: General Datacomm de México
work.summary: I developed a platform for the administration of medical laboratories for the government of the state of Quintana Roo. I scaled the material resources control platform in the health sector. I collaborated with the technical team to make the change from the development stack to a modern architecture.

work.name: Administración Portuaria Integral de Quintana Roo
work.summary: I developed a platform for port operation management for the government of Quintana Roo. I developed the platform for inventory control of port facilities. I designed and implemented the platform for the management of the company's internal processes.

education.institution: Tecnológico Nacional de México, Campus Chetumal
